member.name: T:Penguin.Cms.Email.Abstractions.EmailMessageState
member.summary: Represents the sent state of the message, used when queueing

member.name: F:Penguin.Cms.Email.Abstractions.EmailMessageState.Unsent
member.summary: No attempt has been made to send the message

member.name: F:Penguin.Cms.Email.Abstractions.EmailMessageState.Success
member.summary: The previous attempt to send the message was successful

member.name: F:Penguin.Cms.Email.Abstractions.EmailMessageState.Failure
member.summary: The previous attempt to send the message resulted in an error

member.name: F:Penguin.Cms.Email.Abstractions.EmailMessageState.Debug
member.summary: The message should not be sent for environment reasons and no attempt has been made

member.name: F:Penguin.Cms.Email.Abstractions.EmailMessageState.Skip
member.summary: The message should not be sent due to some kind of business logic and no attempt has been made
